short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share Youtube Video Urls to Blizz

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is a helper plugin for a set of users of Divine Blizz app (an android app). 
The app focuses on displaying enriching catholic contents from various sources including embedded videos from youtube. Once the plugin is installed, the user can watch a youtube video and share its URL with the server of Blizz app. The shared youtube video will be filtered by the back end team and if appropriate will be made visible in the app. If the youtube video is not playing, the plugin will display a portion of the Malayalam Catholic Bible.
